name: Orbital Traversal
description:
Physics based 2D space game where orbital mechanics is your friend and enemy.  Use super simple controls and your ability to exploit the gravitational force of each planetary body to traverse 18 challenging levels.  This is the first release of this game (and my first game), there may be an android build sometime in the near future.

Thanks for playing, your feedback is appreciated.

Changelog

Version 1.1.2 :  Fixed an input issue related to stuck mouse input on Chrome. 

Version 1.1 now available!  Added several difficulty levels for you slow folks out there, along with a few other cosmetic changes.

Credits:

2D Art by: Arisan,  Kenney Vleugels, reivaxcorp, Warspawn
Music and Sound by: The Cynic Project / cynicmusic.com / pixelsphere.org, pauliuw, nenadsimic
